content: उपजीव् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To live upon, subsist by, derive livelihood from, be supported by; उपजीव्यमानपादच्छायः <ls>K. 5</ls>; कां वृत्तिमार्य उपजीवति <ls>Mk. 2</ls>; संवाहकस्य वृत्तिं {%<ab>ibid.</ab>%}; शेषास्तमुपजीवेयुर्यथैव पितरं तथा <ls>Ms. 9. 105</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 301.</ls> {@--2@} To live under, be dependent on, serve; <ls>Śi. 9. 32.</ls> {@--3@} To make use of, derive materials (for writing from); तदेतद्भारतं नाम कविभिस्तूपजीव्यते <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--4@} To practise; <ls>Ms. 10. 74.</ls>
